product.long-description-PEP: Varsity-inspired stripes give this waxed calfskin card case a collegiate twist and a vibrant pop of pattern. Slim design. Single-needle stitched edges. Debossed "Polo Ralph Lauren" at one side. Pockets are lined with faille. Median slip pocket and three card slots at each side. Debossed signature pony at one side. Presented in our signature "Polo Ralph Lauren" embossed box. 3 1/4" H x 4" L x 1/4" D. Leather, polyester. Imported.

product.long-description-PEP: This trendsetting boot is one you'll wear all season long. The Becka Addie Boot is crafted in sleek suede and features fun fringe detailing on the sides. product.display-name-PEP: Sherpa Reversible All Season Mattress Pad - Online Only
product.long-description-PEP: This luxurious, four-seasons mattress pad provides you with both comfort and protection, all year long.The "Winter" side features an ultra soft, polyester Sherpa fabric that keeps you cozy and warm while the "Summer" side's 100% cotton, 200 thread count construction keeps you cool and dry. This pad also offers stain repel and release protection for ease of care, and a poly-knit stretch skirt that is guaranteed to fit mattresses up to 18 inches.Measurements:Full: 54-in. x 75-in.Queen: 60-in. x 80-in.King: 78-in. x 80-in.
